/* Commemoration */ better photos of the Vimy Memorial are needed

/* 90th anniversary of the battle */ cut para. down
/* Main assault */ full section edit of main assault, small edits still likely needed
/* Tactical plan */ add frontage in yd & m of attack

/* Trench raiding */ Made a few grammatical corrections; made one run-on sentence more clear.
/* Training */ Changed "utilizing" to "utilized" to make sentence sensible.
/* Tactical plan */ restored a period to obvious sentence ending.
/* Tactical plan */ restored two lost letters to the word "and"
